name: Happy Dance Collection
overview: Happy Dance is a game that utilize the full potential of the motion sensing interface of Nintendo Wii consoles. Grab ahold of your Wii remote control, follow the character on screen and launch your moves, before you know it, you are relieved of your stress and ounces of fat. The game allows you to put your Mii's into the game, pulling you further into the dance. Get items, accessories and coordinate your outfit. Music, is of course a very important thing, chart topping Jpop songs such as Kokoni iru yo and Akai Sweet Bee by the newest hit group Shuuchishin are included as well. Start a dance party, see who is the best dancer amongst your friends or family in the VS mode and Tag mode. The others who are not dancing at the mean time, can cheerlead as warm-up.
